_sensor_model_helper_text: Enter the basic model name of the sensor
_entry_year_helper_text: Starting from which year is the sensor available? Enter year oder leave empty
_end_of_life_helper_text: When was the sensor type cancelled? Provide the year or leave empty
_pixel_lens_cra: Pixel CRA in the sensor corners
_pixel_lens_cra_helper_text: What is the angle under which off axis angle does the sensor the light to arrive? This angle is nonzero if the sensor has shifted microlenses. Leave empty if in doubt.
_pixel_size_helper_text: Enter pixel size in micrometers or leave empty
_housing_x_helper_text: Enter sensor housing width (x) or leave empty
_housing_y_helper_text: Enter sensor housing height (y) or leave empty
_housing_glass_helper_text: enter the sensor glass type or leave empty
_optical_center_y_helper_text: enter the optical center (y) in mm or leave empty
_optical_center_x_helper_text: enter the optical center (y) in mm or leave empty
_glass_lid_thickness: Thickness of the sensor cover glass
_glass_lid_thickness_helper_text: Enter the thickness of the sensor cover glass or leave empty
_focal_plane_from_bottom: Distance from Bottom to sensor plane
_focal_plane_from_bottom_helper_text: Distance in millimeters from bottom to Sensor Plane. Leave empty if unknown
_glass_index: Refraction Index of the sensor cover glass
_glass_index_helper_text: Enter the refraction index of the sensor cover glass or leave empty
_other_info_helper_text: Enter other relevant info about the sensor or leave empty
_glass_lid_type_helper_text: Enter the type of the sensor cover glass or leave empty
_sensor_type_helper_text: Enter sensor type (Area oder Line Scan)
_shutter_type_helper_text: Select Shutter type, multiple choices allowed
_spectrum_helper_text: For which light Spectrum is the sensor available? UV = UV Liight, VIS = visible light, NIR = near Infrared, SWIR = Short wave Infrared
_state_helper_text: is the sensor information complete or still under construction
_supplier_helper_text:
Choose between done (complete) and working (under construction).
Choose only DONE if, well, the information is complete
